attributes.comment:
To whom it may concern, I am a single women in the process of waiting for my
first and only child from China. The whole process is very expensive,even before
going to China and with the wait getting longer and longer even more expensive.
The big problem is with this wait being longer we have to renew many of our
papers such as Home Study, fingerprints, and the 1600A. This is quite expensive
the first time around but with a second go round and the potential increase of 60%
or more is so very difficult for us working class people. Our goal is to bring a child
in to our family and our wonderful free country to love and to be a furture asset to
this country. Please reconsider these increases, as many adoptive families are
also struggling to bring their children home to America. Thank you Adoptive Parent
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Helenanne Keenan-Joerger
